sectionData.title: Why Peru?
sectionData.content:
Peru and Colombia were carefully chosen because of its friendly, english-speaking population. With strong American cultural influences and reliable telecommunications.

Peru is one of the fastest-growing country in South America. Strategic geographical location. Same time zone as United States and Latin America. Strong cultural affinity with North America.

Reliable telecommunications infrastructure.
sectionData.markdownContent:
# Why Peru?

Peru and Colombia were carefully chosen because of its friendly, english-speaking population. With strong American cultural influences and reliable telecommunications.

Peru is one of the fastest-growing country in South America. Strategic geographical location.

Same time zone as United States and Latin America. Strong cultural affinity with North America.

Reliable telecommunications infrastructure.
